data.text: Yahweh, listen [IDM] to what I say and answer me,
Prevent me from dying now, because I ◄am loyal to/continue to believe in► you;
Lord, cause me to be glad,
Lord, you are good to us, and you forgive us;
When I have troubles, I call out to you,
Lord, among all the gods whom the heathen nations worship,
Lord, some day, people from all the nations that you have established will come and bow down in front of you
You are great, and you do wonderful/marvelous things;
Yahweh, teach me what you want me to do
Lord, my God, I will thank you with all my inner being,
You faithfully love me very much;
But God, proud men are trying to attack me;
But Lord, you always are mercifully and kind;
Look down toward me and be merciful to me;
Yahweh, do something to show me that you are being good to me
